response.message: If you want to add a second app server, you don't need sticky sessions, you can just through the session state into a database using ASP.NET configuration settings.

I thought Joel wasn't very fond of Ray:

http://www.joelonsoftware.com/items/2008/05/01.html

It was interesting to find out that he thought highly of him, or was that sarcasm? :)

Interesting that Audible was now a sponsor. I seem to recall a couple of episodes where Jeff and Joel basically said they turned Audible down because they didn't use or believe in their product. I guess you gotta pay the bills...
Are you clever people not the least embarrassed by the fact that the audio player is displaying the word "undefined" instead of the title of the podcast?
Great podcast, really interesting stuff. More like this please. Geeks just chatting :-)
